Job Description: Roles & Responsibilities: - Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements - Solve complex technical, scalability or performance challenges - Define and ensure compliance to software engineering standards across the engineering team. - Project requirement understanding. - Developing codes based on the analysis to make the project functional - Reviewing the output from code quality equipment - Troubleshoot any problems encountered. Requirements  Minimum 5 years software development experience either in job offered or as Developer. Nice to have 3 years' experience with the following: working with Visual Studio ASP.NET MVC, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Knockout JS, Angular 2+, Angular Material Design, C #.RESTful API Web Services and Web applications ,Entity framework, Azure SQL DB, Azure Paas services, SoftwareDevelopment Life Cycle: Requirements Gathering, Design, Development, Testing and Deployment.Nice to have SSRS AND SSIS exposure.
PG: Post Graduation Not Required, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
Doctorate: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
